welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Warrensville Heights, where charm meets modernity in the heart of the United States. Get ready to experience our vibrant city known for its rich history, diverse culture, and endless opportunities for exploration. We invite you to make unforgettable memories and enjoy everything our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Burke Lakefront Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Burke Lakefront Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hopkins International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A primarily serves domestic flights for airlines such as American Airlines and Delta.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as Southwest and United.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fulton International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fulton International Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
